comments.body: Boats are still useful before you get Depth Strider, though.
Enchantments for boats? Y.E.S.
Boat enchantments...you should make three or four boat enchantments like indestrucktability and things like that.

Awesome! I think that the boats shouldn’t be able to be enchanted through an enchanting table though. There should be like another way maybe through enchanted books or some other method. Also the enchantments should be pretty rare if not I feel like it would make travelling too easy especially on ice. Maybe the speed enchantment would speed you up in water but slow you down on ice? Thanks.

OR ! Enchant them with fire protection so you can use it to glide on lava in the nether !
ALSO a really good concept would be a shield enchantment to prevent mobs from getting in the boat such as spiders, drowned, skeletons CREEPERS !
I would love this for races!

YES! Enchanting Boats:
Depth Strider makes them go faster.
Respiration makes them more resistance to bubbles from Magma or Soul blocks.

(As much as I would like the idea of Respiration = submarine, that might be too much)
Or maybe rather than faster maybe an air bubble, and night vision enchantments. The same as what the heart of the sea does but it only works when your in the boat underwater. no area of effect.
we need boats with speed enchant

in the same sense you can say remove all tools except netherite cuz netherite is faster. the point of boats is to be a early game thing for traveling the oceans getting a enchanting table and waiting for some time to get depth strider its a more useful thing but a lot harder
This is Skizzleman's #1 request. And it makes a lot of sense. Lava boats, or boats that can "climb" would add a lot to the game.
what about custom music discs?
Yea need more discs or ability to have our own music
If you would like to have custom music discs, just search up Custom Music Discs.
I just realized that the music from Alpha is soooo good! It really does give a upgraded feel of Minecraft.

Here, I got a video of all the music from Minecraft ever made in alphabetical order and by category. Minecraft's Music

You might want to put this in with your post.
revenge by captainsparkles as a music disc
What if we could repair disc 11 (the creepy disc) to get Eleven (from Volume Beta)?
More music by C418 in Minecraft is always welcome. jilithespaceboy23's suggestion about way to obtain Eleven is a great idea too, we could have creative ways to make these discs.
I agree. I also think they should include "Dog" if you use "Cat" on a grindstone, "Eleven" if you use "11", and "Thirteen" if you use "13".
This or a texture like stone bricks in the terracotta colors.  EIther way, I absolutely agree that we need another form of terracotta for building, especially if it involves slabs and stairs.
I absolutely agree my Japanese buildings need green roof tiles. And my Roman forts need red roof tiles! And maybe an additional ridge roofing tile. Cool!
Or the skin that deepslate tiles use! I would love to see this kind of pattern in terracotta, would make the best roofs
I don't have to use another block and pretend they're roof tiles!
and set spawn!
And it should be able to remove status effects that make sense and heal the player's health.

I recently found another reason for this: sleeping in a bed disables these annoying phantom spawning instead of endermen / witches at night for 2 -3 nights. For I rarely sleep, I wandered 22 minecraft nights (4 reallife days) through the desert being haunted by these phantoms, wondering why no enderman was spawning - I needed more pearls to reach the end. There really is no way a player would ever find this function out ingame, but it is a legit reason to go to bed in the afternoon of a day if you dislike phantoms and want to go hunting at night.

Also, we want to be able to set our spawn during the day as well.

A third reason would be the idea, that sleeping in the bed would allow the player to reach his "creative" worlds - they would be "dreams" the player has, and creative mode would be only available from here (It would be easy to reach with a survival world where the player always stands next to his bed, so no big loss to creative-only-players.)
This would open the door to a lot of automation that I don't think the Mojang devs will want. Sorry.

I think this should at least take a diamond.  A wither star might even be appropriate, since the wither is currently one of the only tools people can use for automated block breaking, and it would make the block breaker appropriately end-game.

But based on what I remember from ilmango's recent videos, Mojang have also been taking steps to take wither-based block breakers out of the game. Might be wrong there. Either way, this block would naturally be way easier to set up and use than a wither...

I personally don't care what the devs think. As long as it uses durbility from a actual tool. Give Us block placers and block breakers. Once mobs eat dropped entities, We have this, And auto crafter block minecraft will be fully automated. Only then will the game be complete.

You got my vote!

I agree with 364950077372, and I think the developers want minecraft to stay simple, and this would break that simplicity. On top of that, this would make getting blocks far too easy, and survival won't be as fun anymore.

You forgot to put "block placers" in too, however i support every block breaker/placer topic on here cuz it just must get added in my opinion, grinding for hours n hours ain't that fun knowing how much got added in the game now!!

Also engineering is way way more fun than mining, if ppl want to keep doing everything manuall, then dont craft them lol

No to auto crafting to

Outdoorpoete94,

Think a little further than that pls,

Note having this in the game creates many ways off playing the game, once u finished like 3 automators, that'll be the whole challange, to make it even better, maybe make them mobile tru pistons, just think bout it how many new things ppl would build :)

I would make a block breaker that brakes all kinds of stone. I would craft it with 3 iron picaxes at the top, Redstone in the middle and a hopper under the Redstone, the rest of the space is smooth stone. It also works as a hopper but if it's not powered it will work as a chest with 4 spaces.

i dont see why a simple block breaking item would hurt. maybe add the feature to the end rod (it fits with the theme  endermen can pick up blocks)

the devs just seems to have it out for the sandbox aspect of the game sometimes..wow that farm is incredible.. aannd its gone.  its an amazing part of the game  just as valued as adventuring.  I just dont get how devs think that an OPTION can take away from a sandbox.
they aslo should protect from fire

This would represent an enormous buff for this item.... is your premise that totems of undying are not powerful enough?

Apparently the totem of undying grants Fire Resistance in all editions except Java, would you support adding that feature to Java? I would.

The shielding effect is interesting, but I'd think the Resistance II would make the shielding redundant. I'd actually stick with the shielding effect only - otherwise, the whole thing will start to feel like a knockoff Notch Apple (which has Fire Resistance, Regeneration, Absorption, and Resistance...). The shielding would give the item some uniqueness.

I do want some clarification on the shield aura. Would it block mêlée damage?.... I guess I just want to know if there was any logic behind the specific damage sources you chose as protected against by the shield aura. It's also not going to be an actual status effect, or will it?

My thinking was that it should be a status effect so that it can also be given through commands (for maps etc). The effect itself wouldn't give melee damage reduction (so it doesn't just become a better version of Resistance). I would support the totem granting Fire Resistance in Java as well.
I say add in the Shielding effect but not the resistance.

Agreed. However, I don't know how they would manage borderless glass that isn't stained. I feel like it wouldn't be visible enough. Although, that would be very useful in a lot of ways. Like a slightly more noticeable breakable barrier block obtainable in survival.

And yes, building with regular glass blocks with the border looks very 2012. XD
YESSS PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE give us borderless glass. Building windows with this will totally improve the aesthetic. The current glass looks so ugly and ruins builds.

Completely agree. Please add this!!! Bordered glass looks horrendous in any build that is meant to look realistic. It seems like a small change but it would be a monumental improvement to the creative aspect of minecraft.

Pirates! They have pirate ships but no pirates! You could have nice pirate who trade gold with you diamonds or even a “treasure map” that leads to a close ravine with diamonds. OR bad pirates that hunt you at night.
Please :')
Bitte gebt uns randloses Glas das würde in Häusern als Fenster usw viel besser aussehen. Bitte bitte bitte
It actually should be called a glowing ink sac
Good idea

Glow ink is a great addition to make the writing on signs glow, or glow paint splatters on blocks.

Watch systemzee's video on YouTube for a visual reference.
MAybe we could include dynamic lighting in this update as well because for the moment they don't actually glow.
Possibly also could be used as glow-in-the-dark ink on signs?

I think this would be a great addition.

Other uses for the ink could be; glowing writing inside books, and a new unique rare glowing dye to go along with banner making, glowing wool color, leather armor that glows, glowing wolf collars and ect.
Released!
Good idea I thought I was the only one that saw the candles in minecraft live.
Your idea is so good
I didn't see the trailer, but I like this idea (A lot!)
candles are new and i think its a good idea :)
How do we get on it
Add candles
Underwater redstone! Yes!
Absolutely!
It can also not connect to regular redstone, like bluestone for example
YES PERFECT
Copper wires in water wiol shock you
how about insulated and uninsulated versions the uninsulated version could give you quite a shock

Copper|Copper|Copper

Redstone|Redstone|Redstone

Copper|Copper|Copper

This will make more sense, because redstone can't touch water. This could blend in on copper, making better traps

I like this implementation the most of the suggestions I've seen. I like the idea of copper wire needing redstone in the recipe so it integrates with redstone and making it waterloggable as well as going up blocks or in positions redstone currently can't. I imagine it more as carrying redstone signal but not affecting the blocks underneath, just the block it terminates at.
There's actually countless posts like this here so why not go give them a vote?
There's a suggestion just like this with 1,257 votes named, "Bookshelves are unexciting. Let’s fix that". Go vote!
Yeah working bookshelf's are the best idea so put working bookshelf's

Bookshelves would have several forms depending on how filled they were. Empty, slightly filled, and full. We could store books, book and quills, signed books, and enchanted books inside. Bookshelves could even have different wood types and maybe crimson and warped are nonflammable. This would be great for function, appearance, and would allow a lot of variation in the sometimes monotonous libraries. Different shelf types and functioning shelves would be a game changing!
It would be great if they could hold a large amount of books but only non stackable books like Enchanted books and Book and Quill books can be in them, also different wood types would be great.
Released!
Yes please! This would be so useful on Realms.

Yes, this is a fantastic idea, I was just complaining about this the other day to people on my server. It would be so nice if you could see people on the map while it was in the frame. It would look nice and it would be so much easier than switching maps back and forth all the time trying to find someone.

No. I hate magic GPS. It shouldn't exist in minecraft. Unless you can craft a complex satellite and an entire space infrastructure, you shouldn't be able to put a GPS tracker on me. Maybe you also want a mechanic where you don't have to milk the cows, but buckets of milk just appear in your inventory, or you don't have to chop trees for wood, etc.
Good idea if it was a separate type of item frame with this functionality beacuse otherwise I would have lag concerns about lag.

And how about having multiple map locators in a item frame that basically shows multiple maps together and having the locations of the players! For example: a 3X3 map that shows one player in the top left and another player in the middle!

To add to this, I think the best way to avoid it feeling broken would be to make it so that players not on the map displayed would only show up if in the area of that map. Other than that this should be a mandatory snap pick quality of life update, cannot imagine upgrading your maps, exploring the whole thing, just to put it in an item frame for the war room and having it literally stop working.

 

 

Edit:I would also like to see dispensers/droppers be able to put items into item frames, this would enable a lot of new redstone to foolery but primarily a way to confirm a trap or other device has triggered from a distance.
Yes, this should be a feature. Isn't this already possible in java edition? If so, please add to Bedrock!
Yes please! We would love to have this feature on realms.
Love this idea. I would KILL to be able to make a radar in minecraft for my base, without having to hold the map in hand.
This is actually and awesome idea, I would love to see it in the game!

I am making Phasmophobia in Minecraft using redstone, built a huge electronic map display above the building with all the routes on it so that players inside would show their location just like on the monitors in the van in the actual game. Was disappointed to see a small unmoving green marker where the item frame is. Players now have to hold the map in their hand and I have to trust them not to leave the van with it. I hope this becomes a feature soon!

This is a great idea, as note blocks are broken in the game right now, missing several qualities needed to make an actual song. However, there should also be a note block interface which lets you adjust the note, (currently I need to look up a website to know the note) but also the speed, duration, and volume of the note. You could also suggest a block that lets you save songs onto records to make in-game soundtracks without clearing out large areas for the Redstone mechanism. This honestly needs to be considered by Developers as it would make custom maps better when not using resource packs.
So if you want the Note Block, the most broken block in the game to be fixed, give this post a vote
Not a bad shout to be fair, I’m 100% behind this. That would lead to the possibility of some form of shine potion that gave a lob get er duration of the ability. I can back this 100%
I think that it should also give you nausea and or blindness when eaten.

At the moment, shroomlight blocks are just a weird alternative to glowstone, I think something like this would be great and would make them feel more like a finished feature rather than a weird unnecessary block added just to light up the biomes.

This is actually not bad! Another good source in the nether is good. But I think we could change it up a bit, every time you break it, it will be 50 50 of if you get sroomlight chunks or not. Also have a 8 second effect of Nausea

Both a new nether food source and a way to get the glowing effect! I like it.

I think a short nausea effect is okay, but too much and it will become very annoying.
You could literally make spirals with this. you might want to add a sticky minecart in too then or one you can buckle into.
You could literally make spirals with this. you might want to add a sticky minecart in too then or one you can buckle into.
Perfect idea, but hard to implement.
394117313011 The minecart wouldn't fall of the sticky rails, since they are sticky. Also, what do you mean by spirals
I mean as you travel along you could spiral around the track, and do loop-the-loops
What does it do
399863417611 as stated in the post, it can be placed on sides and bottoms of blocks, allowing for more interesting methods of transportation via the minecart
What about the camera view??
I love this idea! You could make elevators and awesome roller coasters with this. I hope this gets added someday.
This sounds like fun.

i think you should have to craft dog collars maybe with iron and string it adds another hardship to taming them... if your dog gets lost and another player finds it they can maybe click the collar and it'll teleport to you.
This is not cave update bro!
cant wait to see a cave update. good idea. hopefully they use your idea for a cave update. i do believe that 1.15 will be a farm update though
Another good idea you could do is use the crystals to get new armor.
Could be a mountain biome exclusive find and hence fits in the next major update! Would like to have them!
You should be able to take some kind of crystal shards and craft them into crystal blocks of many colors. This could be a way to implement colored light sources and colored lighting
Congrats, a variant of cave crystal called the Amethyst Crystal is going to be a feature for this update.
heck yes replace chain with stone
Of course not. Armor is made from items not blocks. Plus how could you even move around in that armor?
It should have a bit more durability then gold armor since is stone I guess
The stone armor can also include a progress like having to super heat the stone to make stone ingots
It could be as good as chainmail.
Great Idea,I like what you said about stone armor
I guess it could be stronger than gold and leather but weaker then chainmail but maybe not some special abilities
When I first started playing Minecraft I thought stone armor was a thing but now I know it’s not. It would be very useful
Honestly i think its a grand idea, but i think chainmail should still be better that it but it offers higher durability but worse protection
I definitely agree.  This would make weakness potions much eaisier to brew!

These sound really neat.  Black wood and purple leaves would be awesome for building.  They would be a pain in the rear to harvest, but I imagine you could plant new saplings on end stone that's easier to get to.
would the trees grow from the bottom of the end?

maybe also sometimes a castle made of endstone and blackwood could be upside down too, with an upside down enemy. inside. i also thing maybe it would grow on fertile endston, made from dirt and endstone. i love your great idea idea.
Please, no.
and the planks and wood to be grey maybe
It would be DOPE to add that I LOVE the idea of sweeping edge !!!!!!!!!!!
This would be the best thing that you will ever do in bedrock
I play mainly bedrock and we really need AOE damage for mob farms
I definitely need it in bedrock for 1.21.40 or future 1.21 updates because I want to swipe lots of hostile mobs!
Bro, you have 46 votes put it into bedrock please
I imagine they'd rather add actually new plants, not reuse old and replaced tiny flowers (there's a reason they changed the single rose).

Given that the Sniffer came from ancient times I'm hoping that we get some massive prehistoric plants like giant ferns, and maybe some prehistoric fruit bearing plant. And by massive I mean like 4 or 5 blocks tall.

I would like the sniffer to dig up biome emitting plants. These plants would be found in the biome that they emit. The gameplay would be pretty cool, you find the sniffer's egg, raise it to a full grown sniffer and explore your world collecting the seeds of the biomes you want to build with. The plants also make it easier for beginners to build with biomes. 

I also think it would be nice if the biome affect from these plants would be blocked by unnatural blocks to allow players to build greenhouses without leakage in or out.

I would like plants that can be used for decor and can be a food source and maybe some uses like potions I feel like this would impact the game a lot I also want the sniffer not to be uses like every on expects it to
Bring it, love it, want more of it.  Lage ferns would be great as mentioned above.  Especially if we could then hide in them and not be seen.
i think they should add crops ass well and not just decorative plants because it would be nice to have more to the farming side of Minecraft.
please let me vote in march 14 in 2023

I suggest to add a unique tree seed, that only sniffer can dig out. A tree would be impossible to get in other way, as the tree would not produce its own seeds. So sniffer would have a reason to exist.
I think that's something really necessary after too many years with the tradicional chest. Please, consider it.
I think this would be good for different types of bases and maybe you could use the different types to organise your stuff in survival
Yeah, it would help players to make more unique designs and choose better options for theirs structures! Regular chest exist as only possible option from the beginning of the game.
Yes we definitely need different types of chests to match different types of wood
MORE EASY TRAVEL!!
We have been wanting this for like 7 years and I highly doubt they will ever add such thing.
Saddles are honestly really common. Go fishing for no more than ten minutes and I bet you find more than one. And nobody even uses saddles anymore. Saddles just take up space in my chests.
It makes little sense to me that we can craft horse armor but not saddles. A lot of people I know think the same thing.
Good idea :D
I think the same
I absolutely agree. Saddles should be rare to get or find. Like in real life they should be made with leather and iron
I like your idea since there is only pumpkin pie in minecraft so far. In real life I am not a big fan of pie though.
I love the idea of one upping the pie collection
Maybe they could along apple pie with this addition! Great idea!
We defiantly need that.
We could do the same thing as pumpkin but is replaced with the berries.
